page.title: 04Leisure Activites In Illogan
page.content: We made a survey by questioning 66 people in our area about their {leisure time.}According to most people BBC was the most watched{T/V channel and hardly anyone watched Breakfast T/V.3 to 4 hours was watched a day.The most popular{T/V}presenters were{Terry {Wogan,Judy Spiers}and{Sue Lawley}and the favourite programmes were drama and comedy.It was watched mostly in the evenings. The favourite sport is {swimming}and then{football.}Most people do sport for fun and it keeps you fit.These are some of the sports they play{Tennis,netball,shinty}and Hockey.The popular pastimes were {reading,gardening}and{horseriding}and {breeding}cats.We asked the people what benefit they gained from their pastime and most{said" a sense of achievement {and satisfaction". {
